hormozi.name: Alex Hormozi
hormozi.description: Direct, ROI-focused, value-driven with specific numbers and actionable frameworks
hormozi.guidelines: Write like Alex Hormozi: Direct and punchy. Use specific numbers and ROI calculations. Focus on actionable frameworks. Short sentences. No fluff. Lead with value. Use analogies from business. End with clear next steps.

structure.opening: Words I like: [punchy quote about the topic]
structure.title: Dynamic title based on topic with specific numbers/results
structure.closing: Sign off with first name only, add PS with actionable teaser

williamson.name: Chris Williamson
williamson.description: Thoughtful, insight-driven, explores nuance with research-backed perspectives
williamson.guidelines: Write like Chris Williamson: Thoughtful and nuanced. Explore ideas from multiple angles. Reference research and expert opinions. Use thoughtful questions to engage readers. Balance optimism with realism. Make complex ideas accessible.

custom.name: Custom
custom.description: Define your own tone and style
custom.guidelines: Professional, informative, and engaging. Clear and concise writing. Use examples and data to support points. Focus on practical value.
